title: Forty-Two esports is looking forward to build a team - Diamond and higher
body:
Hey guys,

We, Forty-Two esports, are looking to build up a team to compete in different tournaments and leagues

What do we offer;
competitive experience
high work ethic
at least 3 times practice per week(20+ hours a week)
dedicated staff
friendly multi-gaming community

What do we require;
be at least Dia in SoloQ
working microphone
able to speak, read and write in ENGLISH
a talkative personality
able to work as a team
dedication to the game
interest in pro games

Currently, we are setting up some Tryouts so if you are interested write us a message on Discord.

F2EFiz#6233 or F2EKohtalo#1560
https://discord.gg/hZq3A3y

Looking forward to hear from you.

Greetings,
Fiz and Kohtalo
Owner of Forty-Two esports

replies.body: We are still looking for players.
